name: Deep Learning
description: A comprehensive book on deep learning concepts and applications.
author: Ian Goodfellow

name: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow
description: A practical guide to machine learning using Python libraries.
author: Aurélien Géron

name: Attention is All You Need
description: The seminal paper introducing the Transformer architecture.

name: Andrew Ng Collection
description: A foundational course series on machine learning, hosted on Coursera.
author: Andrew Ng

name: Python Libraries Cheat Sheet
description: A handy cheat sheet covering NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

name: Intro to Large Language Models (Andrej Karpathy)
description: A popular, accessible one-hour YouTube talk by Andrej Karpathy introducing the core concepts and practicalities of large language models. Highly recommended for both newcomers and practitioners.
author: Andrej Karpathy

name: What is a Knowledge Graph?
description: A concise YouTube tutorial covering the fundamentals of knowledge graphs, their applications, and key metrics, with practical insights for ML and AI practitioners.
author: IBM

name: Welcome to the AI Agents Course
description: A free, in-depth course from Hugging Face that takes you from beginner to expert in designing, building, and evaluating AI agents. Covers leading agent frameworks and includes hands-on assignments and community challenges.
author: Hugging Face
